alert.note: Alert for Burleigh; Emmons (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 26 at 5:48PM CDT until July 26 at 6:15PM CDT by NWS Bismarck
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 615 PM CDT FOR SOUTHEASTERN BURLEIGH AND NORTH CENTRAL EMMONS COUNTIES... At 548 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 7 miles southeast of Sterling, or 26 miles east of Bismarck, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe thunderstorm will remain over mainly rural areas of southeastern Burleigh and north central Emmons Counties, including the following locations... Moffit and Driscoll. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
